messages.title: A better plan. A better future.
messages.content: I'm really worried about the future of the NHS if the Tories get in again. Our NHS needs a Labour government. - Nina, Nurse

messages.title: THE LIB DEMS BROKE THEIR PROMISE TO PROTECT OUR FRONTLINE NHS

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more nurses and 8,000 GPs, guarantee a GP appointment within 48 hours, guarantee cancer tests and results within a week.

images.caption: A better plan. A better future.

leaflet.additionalNotes: None of our manifesto commitments require extra borrowing.
